;。最小
;。眼睛容易
;。开源
;。完全免费，没有广告
;

entry.title: Gizzz磁带
entry.content:
潜入吉萨（King Gizzard）和蜥蜴（lizard）的令人振奋的世界，带着liz胶，您的
;现场音乐会盗版的一站式应用程序！从互联网档案的庞大档案中进行策划，
; gizz磁带可让您在单击按钮时重温乐队的传奇性能。这是一个严格的非正式应用程序，与乐队无关，为粉丝们设计。所有音频均托管
;并直接从Internet档案中流式传输，而艺术品，展示笔记和元数据
;
;来自kglw.net。受Phish.in和Relist等平台的启发，Gizz Tapes
;将现场音乐档案和社区音频收藏的音频融合在一起，提供了无缝的聆听体验。现场表演，从爆炸性的Mosh Wordhy套装到
;罕见的亲密表演。 Bluesky或订阅我们的原子供稿，以便在添加新的节目时获得通知。直接在我们的问题跟踪器上发出发出的问题
;
;。想贡献吗？检查我们的git存储库！请考虑捐款
;支持他们在保存数字文化并为所有人保持音乐的重要工作，并使您的唱片保持着。 Gizzz磁带：因为果酱不会停止！
;
entry.summary: 溪流吉扎国王和蜥蜴向导可以送您的手机！

entry.title: tsacdop -fork-播客播放器
entry.content:
tsacdop-fork是tsacdop的叉子；一个简洁，简单，友好的播客应用程序，既是免费又是开源的。 GPODDER和PODCAST搜索API当前不支持
;
;为什么
;
;
; ; ;唯一设计;：使用TSACDOP，您将拥有与其他播客玩家相比的全部不同经验。它具有独特的布局，具有良好的材料设计。服务器。重音颜色选项
;*下载脱机播放
;*自动下载新剧集 /自动删除下载
;*设置备份
;* Skip Silence
;*加载本地音频文件
;更多功能to来...
;
;许可
;免费，开源，没有广告。 TSACDOP-FORK是根据GPL V3.0许可的开源项目。您可以在GitHub上播放或分叉：https：//github.com/lojcs/tsacdop
;联系人
; tsacdop-fork在开发阶段很安静，我正在研究新功能。如果您有任何问题或请求其他功能，请在Github上告诉我。
entry.summary: 与TSACDOP-FORK一起欣赏播客！一个干净，美丽而友好的应用程序。

entry.title: 威胁Cooponionchat
entry.content:
＃threadScooponionChat
;此版本是来自enfocado en la privacidad的“ https://github.com/session-foundation/session-android”的叉子。与通信的安全性，我不断地研究消息传递应用程序中的潜在安全漏洞。描述了方面，因为不建议使用会话，我想知道如何将关注隐私的基金会（以其获得的赠款和支持）为可能造成这种协议的影响。与仅仅是隐私和安全粉丝的人相比，比基金会小得多。 “ https://soatok.blog/2025/01/14/dont-session-session-session-session-sessions-sucht-fork/#insuffitic--entropy-endropy-ed25519”
; 2>; 2>;“ “ https://soatok.blog/2025/01/14/dont-use-session-session-signal-fork/#public-keys-aes-gcm”
;这是从会话中重点介绍的分叉版本。
entry.summary: 一个针对会话隐私的分叉版本

entry.title: loandrynotes
entry.content: Laundrynotes是一个Android应用程序，可让您管理家庭中所有服装和面料的洗涤说明。该应用程序包含发现标签以及它们的描述的主要符号，以帮助您记住如何有效地浇水。 Laundrynotes允许您为每件衣服存储信息，从而轻松记住如何洗衣服。 Laundrynotes完全防水！护理说明将保留在您的智能手机上。项目，添加自定义注释的选项以获取其他信息，将项目组织成类别的选项以及按类别或名称查找项目的搜索功能。要添加新项目，只需单击“+”按钮，然后使用所需信息填写表格。要查看或修改现有项目，只需在列表中单击它。要删除项目，请按并保留符号以打开删除菜单
entry.summary: 存储所有面料的洗涤信息和符号，使洗衣店更容易！

entry.title: BLE经理
entry.content: Android的BLE Manager应用程序简化了管理设备的特性。用描述符指定数据类型，图形组件和可选属性（例如最小值和最大值）来注释每个特征。就这样！连接后，该应用将自动显示描述特征，使您能够读取并修改其值。所有组件完全支持您的设备中的通知和指示，以进行无缝交互
entry.summary: 轻松控制BLE设备。不需要图书馆。

entry.title: OpenConnect
entry.content:
Android的OpenConnect是一个SSL VPN客户端，支持多种协议：
;* Cisco AnyConnect或OpenConnect
;* Juniper网络连接
;* PALO ALTO Networks globalProtect
;* pul puls puls pul pul pul pul connect <* f5 big-ip ssl VPN
;* FortInet SSL VPN
;* Array SSL VPN
;
;功能：
;*一单击连接（批处理模式）
;*支持RSA SecureID和TOTP软件Tokens
;*保存功能，以进行预先执行的方案障碍
;*与ARMV7，X86和MIPS设备兼容
;*无根请求
;*基于Popenconnect Linux软件包
;
;
;要求：
;* Android 6.0或更高版本或更高
;**以合适的VPN Server
;
;
;该产品。由OpenSSL项目开发的软件用于
; OpenSSL工具包（https://www.openssl.org/）。
entry.summary: openConnect VPN客户端的Android UI

author.name: 弗朗西斯·拉波因特（Francis Lapointe）

entry.content:
WISPAR是一个用户友好且对隐私友好的应用程序，无缝地使用CrossRef API搜索科学期刊和文章。通过关注您的首选期刊并在主要供稿中收到新的文章摘要，以保持最新信息。无需帐户。 UntayWall的集成确保了方便地访问开放访问文章，而EZProxy有助于克服订阅障碍。如果您想做出贡献，请访问我们的github存储库：https：//github.com/scriptbash/wispar
;如果该应用程序不使用您的语言，请考虑通过访问Weblate实例来帮助翻译： https://hosted.weblate.org/engage/wispar
entry.summary: 在您的学习领域中保持最新的文章！

entry.title: Mnemosyne

author.name: 圣地亚哥·奥雷拉纳（Santiago Orellana）

entry.content: Mnemosyne以希腊的记忆女神命名，是一个旨在记住相关信息列表的应用程序。德语，最终必须记住大约50个动词的列表，这些动词是所谓的“ vertagety动词”。一个人可以一次输入列表项目，并获得遗漏的反馈。该应用程序要创建列表，或者只需手动创建它们即可。多个列表，每行一个。因此，一个可以保存在其他地方的导出列表。一个人通过将小组标题前缀为列表标题创建一个小组，然后是“：”。
entry.summary: 一个为列表而不是传统闪存卡设计的记忆应用程序

entry.title: Zashi：Zcash钱包
entry.content:
Zashi是一个ZCASH钱包，可保留您的交易和消息历史记录。钱包？ （Zashi您的妈妈！Zashi您的咖啡师！）
;*它是可靠且快速的，其中包括在同步之前花费的能力。 （在同步完成之前可以使用。用户支持和开发人员反馈的机制。
entry.summary: Zashi是一个ZCASH钱包，可保留您的交易和消息历史记录私有

entry.title: OpenDrummer - Drum Loops
entry.content:
Collection of drum loops in various styles and tempos, designed to enhance your practice by providing solid, high-quality grooves.
;All loops are audio files converted from MIDI using premium soundfonts.
;The tempo can be adjusted by up to 10% in either direction; however,this alters the pitch, so use this feature with caution.
entry.summary: Drum loops in different styles and tempos.

entry.title: MultiLocale
entry.content:
A simple app that enables you to add additional (or "unsupported") languages to your device's locale settings, if the OEM (*ahem* **Xiaomi**) doesn't let you.
;
;Some OEMs, particularly Xiaomi with MIUI/HyperOS, limit users to selecting only one language or locale. This restriction can lead to issues, such as apps displaying incorrect characters due to Han unification, where characters in one language may appear in another. For example, without Japanese added as a locale, apps may show Chinese characters instead of Japanese ones.
;
entry.summary: Add additional languages to your device's locale settings

entry.title: WhatsApp Cleaner
entry.content:
WhatsApp Cleaner - Cleaner for WhatsApp
;
;Cleaner for WhatsApp - Clean Redundant Media and Files from Storage
;
;Did you know that WhatsApp is cluttering your phone with unnecessary media, old
;files, and duplicate images?! WhatsApp Cleaner can help you quickly clean up
;your WhatsApp storage. With a simple tap, you can delete redundant photos,
;videos, documents, and more to reclaim your valuable storage space!
;
;*Key Features:*
;
;- Clean Redundant Media: Scan and clean large files and old media that are no
;longer needed.
;- File Cleanup: Remove unnecessary documents, voice notes, and backups
;cluttering your WhatsApp storage.
;- Fast & Easy: Declutter storage in just a few taps with an intuitive,
;user-friendly interface.
;- Preview Before Deleting: Always preview media before deletion to ensure
;you're removing only the files you don't need.
;
;Note: WhatsApp Cleaner is a third-party application that helps in cleaning
;files generated by WhatsApp, and is not affiliated to or endorsed by WhatsApp itself.
entry.summary: Cleaner for WhatsApp - Clean Redundant Media and Files from Storage

entry.title: Bazarnote
entry.content:
Bazarnote 是一个简单的笔记应用程序，面向购物清单。它只保留有关离线购买商品的最少信息。当您去商店或集市时，Bazarnote可以帮助您跟踪购物清单上的所有商品。
;
;这是一个简单的离线应用程序。只需打开应用程序，输入您的购物清单，跟踪您的产品，仅此而已。
entry.summary: 一个简单的离线购物清单应用程序

entry.title: ReTerminal
entry.content:
;ReTerminal is a sleek, Material 3-inspired terminal emulator designed as a modern alternative to the legacy Jackpal Terminal. Built on Termux's robust TerminalView

;
;
entry.summary: Terminal Emulator

entry.title: Rucoy calculator
entry.content:
Calculate various things related to Rucoy Online:
;* Training calculation : Input your stats and get which mob to train on!
;* Power training calculation : Know which mob to power-train on, based on your stats and class!
;* Offline training calculation : Know how much time is needed to level up a stat with offline training!
;* Damage calculation : Know how much damage you will deal to any mob in the game!
;* Skull calculation : Get how much gold you need to skull!
;
;Works fully offline, has multiple languages, and is completely free! Say goodbye to Rucoy's Gold supporter and its session analytics!
entry.summary: An unofficial calculator for all things Rucoy Online related!

entry.title: Perceived Stress Scale
entry.content:
The Perceived Stress Scale (PSS) is the most widely used psychological instrument for measuring the perception of stress. It is a measure of the degree to which situations in one's life are appraised as stressful. Items were designed to tap how unpredictable, uncontrollable, and overloaded respondents find their lives. The scale also includes a number of direct queries about current levels of experienced stress. The PSS was designed for use in community samples with at least a junior high school education. The items are easy to understand, and the response alternatives are simple to grasp. Moreover, the questions are of a general nature and hence are relatively free of content specific to any subpopulation group. The questions in the PSS ask about feelings and thoughts during the last month.
;
;Evidence for Validity: Higher PSS scores were associated with (for example):
;- failure to quit smoking
;- failure among diabetics to control blood sugar levels
;- greater vulnerability to stressful life-event-elicited depressive symptoms
;- more colds
;
;Because levels of appraised stress should be influenced by daily hassles, major events, and changes in coping resources, predictive validity of the PSS is expected to fall off rapidly after four to eight weeks.
entry.summary: Are you stressed? Take the test to find out how stressed you are.

entry.title: Smither
entry.content:
;Smithers; ist ein Android-Client für Mastodon mit folgenden Features:
;
;- Einfacher Zugriff auf Posts, Nutzerprofile, Listen und Hashtags
;- Echte Timelines (chronologisch/umgekehrt-chronologisch)
;- Anpassbares Aussehen (Schrift & Farben)
;- Unterstützt Push-Benachrichtigungen (unifiedpush)
;- Unterstützt mehrere Accounts unterschiedlicher Instanzen
;- Unterstützt Zugriff über Proxy
;
entry.summary: Lightweight Mastodon client

entry.title: Breakout 71
entry.content:
;
;
;

;
;This is a roguelite twist on the original Breakout/Arkanoid formula.
;The goal is to catch as many coins as possible during 7 levels.
;Coins appear when you break bricks.
;They fly around, bounce and roll, and you need to catch them with your puck.
;Your "combo" is the number of coins spawned when a brick breaks, it is displayed on your puck.
;Your score is displayed in the top right corner of the screen.
;

;
;
;

;
;At the end of each level, you get to pick an upgrade from a random selection, vampire-survivor style.
;Many upgrades impact your "combo". Upgrades apply to the whole run and can synergize.
;For example, "hot start" increases your combo greatly at the start of each level, but makes it tick down rapidly.
;If you combine it with "+1 ball", "piercing" and "bricks become bombs", you'll clear levels so fast that the combo
;will still be high when the fireworks are over and your puck will be showered by coins.
;

;
;
;

;What decides how the ball flies away is only the position of the puck hit.
;The puck speed and incoming angle have no impact.
;You must delete all bricks to progress to the next level, and never drop the ball.
;

;
;
;

;
;After clearing a level, you'll be able to pick upgrades among a small selection presented to you.
;They'll apply until the end of the run.
;A normal run lasts 7 levels, after which your score is recorded, and you can start again.
;

;
;
;

;
;Each run is different, the levels and upgrades you see will change every time, and new ones get added to the pool
;when you progress in the game.
;

;
;
;

;
;The app should work offline and perform well even on low-end devices.
;It's very lean and does not take much storage space (Roughly 0.1MB).
;If the app stutters, turn on "fast mode" in the settings to render a simplified view that should be faster.
;

;
;
;

;
;There's also an easy mode for kids (slower ball) and a color-blind mode (no color related game mechanics).
;

;
entry.summary: Break colourful bricks, catch bouncing coins and select powerful upgrades !

entry.title: 卡斯卡达
entry.content:
It is turn based game between two players where try to collect 9 marbles to win before the other player.
;
;They will pick a color and select a slide to drop the chosen marble which will go thought gates. If any marble has fall to the bottom, they will be add to the score if they match the target colors in the score board.
;
;
;Cascada is a free and open source software version for android of the classical game Avalanche from the '60s ([wikipedia page](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Avalanche_(marble_game))). The mechanics creator is Frank W. Sinden. The publisher of the board game Avalanche is Parker. I'm not associated with any of them in any way.
;
;📡 Offline game
;📺 No ads
;💸 No In-App purchases
;🕵️‍♀️ No user tracking
;🛑 No permissions needed
;📖 Open Source on https://gitlab.com/miguelython/cascada
;👨‍💻 Created with Godot Engine 4
;
;Made with love by Miguel Páez
;
entry.summary: Casual logic game with marbles for two players

entry.title: JK Bike - Mechanical Disaster Prevention
entry.content:
;We have all experienced those rides where something mechanical happens that really was preventable. As the authors, even though we take a certain pride in our own efforts in maintaining smooth running MTBs, and a disdain for our riding buddies who never give a passing thought until something goes 'CRUNCH!' in a ride-ending manner, there are still innumerate situations where something that should have been checked, or usually never needs checked after proper installation, has not been.

;
;
;

;'Where is that vibration coming from?', 'why is the rear end creaking?', 'What is that terrible knocking?' are so often result of something relatively simple being overlooked or forgotten. Recent favourites have been disc rotor bolts backing out, rear thru axles not done up properly, and headsets improperly tensioned.

;
;
;

;So, to prevent mechanical disasters happening on your rides, use this app to build better, new, habits and ensure your rides are (mechanically) glorious.

;
;
;

;This app uses INTERNET permissions to download template activities from a github repository at ;https://github.com/janexner/JKBikeTemplateActivities;. No internet access beyond that.

;
;
entry.summary: App that helps build positive bike maintenance behaviours, for rides quick, big

entry.title: 药丸时间
entry.content:
No ads or trackers of any kind.
;Free and open source.
;Enter your custom meds and their dosage limitations.
;Receive a notification when a dose expires.
;Light and dark themes.
;
;The full source code is available at https://github.com/cliambrown/PillTime
entry.summary: Keep track of meds that can be taken as needed (not at a specific time)

entry.title: Adresilo
entry.content:
Search for places using natural language, then tap one of the icons on the right of a search result. The leftmost icon is Copy. Tapping it puts the place's coordinates in your clipboard for pasting into a calendar event, sending to a friend, etc. The middle icon is Share and opens Android's Share Sheet so you can send the place's name, address, and coordinates to other apps or contacts. The rightmost icon is Open. Tapping it opens the coordinates in any installed app that knows how to handle geo: Intent URIs. That includes eg Organic Maps, OsmAnd, Google Maps, Waze, and more.
;
;You can use your own self-hosted https://git.sr.ht/~amolith/adresilo-server/ or buy codes to use our hosted server at https://adresilo.com
;
entry.summary: Search for places

entry.title: 待办
entry.content: 一个简单的、遵循 Material Design 3 的待办应用。你可以用它来记每日要完成的学校作业，抑或当作日常生活的备忘录。你可以为每项任务设置优先级，并为它们排序，让你的生活有条不紊。
entry.summary: 一个简单的、遵循 Material Design 3 的待办应用。
